abstract: Obama administration approves BP's oil drilling plan for Gulf of Mexico, first since 2010 Deepwater Horizon rig explosion; BP will drill up to four exploratory wells nearly 200 miles from Louisiana coast.
snippet: The Obama administration approved the first oil drilling plan for the company in the Gulf of Mexico since an explosion sank the Deepwater Horizon rig more than a year ago.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration approved the first oil drilling plan for the company in the Gulf of Mexico since an explosion sank the Deepwater Horizon rig more than a year ago.

headline.main: BP’s Plan for Drilling in the Gulf Is Approved
headline.print_headline: BP’s Plan For Drilling In the Gulf Is Approved
headline.seo: BP Plan for Gulf Drilling Is Approved
